Christina "Phazero" Curlee bụ onye na-emepụta egwuregwu vidio na Ratchet na Clank: Rift Apart na Insomniac Games
Thesis Masters nkè Curlee bụ Meaningful Level Design.
Christina gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Texas na Austin na BFA na 2016 na Mahadim California Los Angeles na 2019 na MFA
Christina jikọtara aka na Final Flight, nke akọwapụtara dị ka anime na gbụrụ-gbúrụ ébé óbíbí surrealist na ndị mmemme chọrọ ihe márá mma nke '80s.

Curlee bụ ónyé nnọchi anya 2016 International Game Developers Association Foundation Women in Games. N'afọ 2018, egwuregwu Curlee bụ Artifacts II  São Jacaranda gosipụtara na IndieCade Artifacts bụ ahụmahụ egwuregwu banyere ileghara ányá n'oge ọ bụ nwata, ịnagide, na ihe ọ pụtara ịbụ ónyé toro eto nkè mụtara ibi ndụ dị mma na trauma. Curlee mepụtara Game Design..
Curlee bụ ónyé isi na-emepụta màkà ọkwa Ardolis na ọrụ Spiderbot na Glitch na Ratchet na Clank: Rift Apart.
